verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֗יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <S%H238><s%> Give ear עַ֭מִּי <S%H5971><s%> O my people תּוֹרָתִ֑י <S%H8451><s%> [to] my law הַטּ֥וּ <S%H5186><s%> incline אָ֝זְנְכֶ֗ם <S%H241><s%> your ears לְאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> to the words פִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> of my mouth

אֶפְתְּחָ֣ה <S%H6605><s%> I will open בְמָשָׁ֣ל <S%H4912><s%> in a parable פִּ֑י <S%H6310><s%> my mouth אַבִּ֥יעָה <S%H5042><s%> I will utter חִ֝יד֗וֹת <S%H2420><s%> dark sayings מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> at קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> of old
אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Which שָׁ֭מַעְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> Which we have heard וַנֵּדָעֵ֑ם <S%H3045><s%> and known וַ֝אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H1><s%> and our fathers סִפְּרוּ־ <S%H5608><s%> have told לָֽנוּ׃

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> We will not נְכַחֵ֨ד ׀ <S%H3582><s%> We will not hide מִבְּנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H1121><s%> [them] from their children לְד֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> to the generation אַחֲר֗וֹן <S%H314><s%> to come מְֽ֭סַפְּרִים <S%H5608><s%> shewing תְּהִלּ֣וֹת <S%H8416><s%> the praises יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וֶעֱזוּז֥וֹ <S%H5807><s%> and his strength וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <S%H6381><s%> and his wonderful works אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> that he hath done

וַיָּ֤קֶם <S%H6965><s%> For he established עֵד֨וּת ׀ <S%H5715><s%> a testimony בְּֽיַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> in Jacob וְתוֹרָה֮ <S%H8451><s%> a law שָׂ֤ם <S%H7760><s%> and appointed בְּיִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Which צִ֭וָּה <S%H6680><s%> which he commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> our fathers לְ֝הוֹדִיעָ֗ם <S%H3045><s%> that they should make them known לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1121><s%> to their children

לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> might יֵדְע֨וּ ׀ <S%H3045><s%> might know דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> That the generation אַ֭חֲרוֹן <S%H314><s%> to come בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> [them even] the children יִוָּלֵ֑דוּ <S%H3205><s%> [which] should be born יָ֝קֻ֗מוּ <S%H6965><s%> [who] should arise וִֽיסַפְּר֥וּ <S%H5608><s%> and declare לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1121><s%> [them] to their children

וְיָשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> That they might set בֵֽאלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> in God כִּ֫סְלָ֥ם <S%H3689><s%> their hope וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not יִ֭שְׁכְּחוּ <S%H7911><s%> and not forget מַֽעַלְלֵי־ <S%H4611><s%> the works אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> of God וּמִצְוֹתָ֥יו <S%H4687><s%> his commandments יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H5341><s%> but keep

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יִהְי֨וּ ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become כַּאֲבוֹתָ֗ם <S%H1><s%> And might not be as their fathers דּוֹר֮ <S%H1755><s%> generation סוֹרֵ֪ר <S%H5637><s%> a stubborn וּמֹ֫רֶ֥ה <S%H4784><s%> and rebellious דּ֭וֹר <S%H1755><s%> a generation לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> aright לִבּ֑וֹ <S%H3820><s%> not their heart וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> was not נֶאֶמְנָ֖ה <S%H539><s%> was not stedfast אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> with God רוּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H7307><s%> and whose spirit

בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> The children אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim נוֹשְׁקֵ֥י <S%H5401><s%> [being] armed רוֹמֵי־ <S%H7411><s%> [and] carrying קָ֑שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> bows הָ֝פְכ֗וּ <S%H2015><s%> turned back בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day קְרָֽב׃ <S%H7128><s%> of battle

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁ֭מְרוּ <S%H8104><s%> They kept בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> not the covenant אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וּ֝בְתוֹרָת֗וֹ <S%H8451><s%> in his law מֵאֲנ֥וּ <S%H3985><s%> and refused לָלֶֽכֶת׃ <S%H1980><s%> to walk
וַיִּשְׁכְּח֥וּ <S%H7911><s%> And forgat עֲלִילוֹתָ֑יו <S%H5949><s%> his works וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <S%H6381><s%> and his wonders אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he הֶרְאָֽם׃ <S%H7200><s%> that he had shewed

נֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> he in the sight אֲ֭בוֹתָם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers עָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> did פֶ֑לֶא <S%H6382><s%> Marvellous things בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֣יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt שְׂדֵה־ <S%H7704><s%> [in] the field צֹֽעַן׃ <S%H6814><s%> of Zoan

בָּ֣קַע <S%H1234><s%> He divided יָ֭ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea וַיַּֽעֲבִירֵ֑ם <S%H5674><s%> and caused them to pass through וַֽיַּצֶּב־ <S%H5324><s%> to stand מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> and he made the waters כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like נֵֽד׃ <S%H5067><s%> as an heap

וַיַּנְחֵ֣ם <S%H5148><s%> also he led בֶּעָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> them with a cloud יוֹמָ֑ם <S%H3119><s%> In the daytime וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַ֝לַּ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and all the night בְּא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> with a light אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> of fire

יְבַקַּ֣ע <S%H1234><s%> He clave צֻ֭רִים <S%H6697><s%> the rocks בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness וַ֝יַּ֗שְׁקְ <S%H8248><s%> and gave [them] drink כִּתְהֹמ֥וֹת <S%H8415><s%> depths רַבָּֽה׃ <S%H7227><s%> as [out of] the great

וַיּוֹצִ֣א <S%H3318><s%> He brought נוֹזְלִ֣ים <S%H5140><s%> streams מִסָּ֑לַע <S%H5553><s%> also out of the rock וַיּ֖וֹרֶד <S%H3381><s%> to run down כַּנְּהָר֣וֹת <S%H5104><s%> like rivers מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> and caused waters

וַיּוֹסִ֣יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> yet more ע֭וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still לַחֲטֹא־ <S%H2398><s%> And they sinned ל֑וֹ לַֽמְר֥וֹת <S%H4784><s%> against him by provoking עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> the most High בַּצִּיָּֽה׃ <S%H6723><s%> in the wilderness

וַיְנַסּוּ־ <S%H5254><s%> And they tempted אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God בִּלְבָבָ֑ם <S%H3824><s%> in their heart לִֽשְׁאָל־ <S%H7592><s%> by asking אֹ֥כֶל <S%H400><s%> meat לְנַפְשָֽׁם׃ <S%H5315><s%> for their lust

וַֽיְדַבְּר֗וּ <S%H1696><s%> Yea they spake בֵּֽאלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> against God אָ֭מְרוּ <S%H559><s%> they said הֲי֣וּכַל <S%H3201><s%> Can אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> God לַעֲרֹ֥ךְ <S%H6186><s%> furnish שֻׁ֝לְחָ֗ן <S%H7979><s%> a table בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> desert

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold הִכָּה־ <S%H5221><s%> Behold he smote צ֨וּר ׀ <S%H6697><s%> the rock וַיָּז֣וּבוּ <S%H2100><s%> gushed out מַיִם֮ <S%H4325><s%> that the waters וּנְחָלִ֪ים <S%H5158><s%> and the streams יִ֫שְׁטֹ֥פוּ <S%H7857><s%> overflowed הֲגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again לֶ֭חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread י֣וּכַל <S%H3201><s%> can תֵּ֑ת <S%H5414><s%> he give אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יָכִ֖ין <S%H3559><s%> he provide שְׁאֵ֣ר <S%H7607><s%> flesh לְעַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> folk

לָכֵ֤ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> heard יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore the LORD וַֽיִּתְעַבָּ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> [this] and was wroth וְ֭אֵשׁ <S%H784><s%> so a fire נִשְּׂקָ֣ה <S%H5400><s%> was kindled בְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> against Jacob וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אַ֝֗ף <S%H639><s%> and anger עָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> also came up בְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> against Israel

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not הֶ֭אֱמִינוּ <S%H539><s%> Because they believed בֵּאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> not in God וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not בָ֝טְח֗וּ <S%H982><s%> and trusted בִּֽישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3444><s%> not in his salvation

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> Though he had commanded שְׁחָקִ֣ים <S%H7834><s%> the clouds מִמָּ֑עַל <S%H4605><s%> from above וְדַלְתֵ֖י <S%H1817><s%> the doors שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven פָּתָֽח׃ <S%H6605><s%> and opened

וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר <S%H4305><s%> And had rained down עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> and מָ֣ן <S%H4478><s%> manna לֶאֱכֹ֑ל <S%H398><s%> upon them to eat וּדְגַן־ <S%H1715><s%> them of the corn שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven נָ֣תַן <S%H5414><s%> and had given לָֽמוֹ׃

לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> food אַ֭בִּירִים <S%H47><s%> angels' אָ֣כַל <S%H398><s%> did eat אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Man צֵידָ֬ה <S%H6720><s%> them meat שָׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> he sent לָהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> in לָשֹֽׂבַע׃ <S%H7648><s%> to the full

יַסַּ֣ע <S%H5265><s%> to blow קָ֭דִים <S%H6921><s%> He caused an east wind בַּשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> in the heaven וַיְנַהֵ֖ג <S%H5090><s%> he brought in בְּעֻזּ֣וֹ <S%H5797><s%> and by his power תֵימָֽן׃ <S%H8486><s%> the south wind

וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר <S%H4305><s%> He rained עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> upon כֶּעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> also upon them as dust שְׁאֵ֑ר <S%H7607><s%> flesh וּֽכְח֥וֹל <S%H2344><s%> like as the sand יַ֝מִּ֗ים <S%H3220><s%> of the sea ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> fowls כָּנָֽף׃ <S%H3671><s%> and feathered

וַ֭יַּפֵּל <S%H5307><s%> And he let [it] fall בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst מַחֲנֵ֑הוּ <S%H4264><s%> of their camp סָ֝בִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לְמִשְׁכְּנֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4908><s%> their habitations

וַיֹּאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> So they did eat וַיִּשְׂבְּע֣וּ <S%H7646><s%> filled מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and were well וְ֝תַֽאֲוָתָ֗ם <S%H8378><s%> them their own desire יָבִ֥א <S%H935><s%> for he gave לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not זָר֥וּ <S%H2114><s%> They were not estranged מִתַּאֲוָתָ֑ם <S%H8378><s%> from their lust ע֝֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> While אָכְלָ֥ם <S%H400><s%> But while their meat בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6310><s%> [was] yet in their mouths

וְאַ֤ף <S%H639><s%> The wrath אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> of God עָ֘לָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> came בָהֶ֗ם וַֽ֭יַּהֲרֹג <S%H2026><s%> upon them and slew בְּמִשְׁמַנֵּיהֶ֑ם <S%H4924><s%> the fattest וּבַחוּרֵ֖י <S%H970><s%> the chosen יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> [men] of Israel הִכְרִֽיעַ׃ <S%H3766><s%> of them and smote down

בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all זֹ֭את <S%H2063><s%> likewise חָֽטְאוּ־ <S%H2398><s%> For all this they sinned ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not הֶ֝אֱמִ֗ינוּ <S%H539><s%> still and believed בְּנִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H6381><s%> not for his wondrous works
וַיְכַל־ <S%H3615><s%> did he consume בַּהֶ֥בֶל <S%H1892><s%> in vanity יְמֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3117><s%> Therefore their days וּ֝שְׁנוֹתָ֗ם <S%H8141><s%> and their years בַּבֶּהָלָֽה׃ <S%H928><s%> in trouble

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> When הֲרָגָ֥ם <S%H2026><s%> When he slew וּדְרָשׁ֑וּהוּ <S%H1875><s%> them then they sought וְ֝שָׁ֗בוּ <S%H7725><s%> him and they returned וְשִֽׁחֲרוּ־ <S%H7836><s%> and enquired early אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> after God

וַֽ֭יִּזְכְּרוּ <S%H2142><s%> And they remembered כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> that God צוּרָ֑ם <S%H6697><s%> [was] their rock וְאֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God עֶ֝לְיוֹן <S%H5945><s%> and the high גֹּאֲלָֽם׃ <S%H1350><s%> their redeemer

וַיְפַתּ֥וּהוּ <S%H6601><s%> Nevertheless they did flatter בְּפִיהֶ֑ם <S%H6310><s%> him with their mouth וּ֝בִלְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <S%H3956><s%> unto him with their tongues יְכַזְּבוּ־ <S%H3576><s%> and they lied לֽוֹ׃

וְ֭לִבָּם <S%H3820><s%> For their heart לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> was not right עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> toward וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor נֶ֝אֶמְנ֗וּ <S%H539><s%> with him neither were they stedfast בִּבְרִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1285><s%> in his covenant

וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he רַח֨וּם ׀ <S%H7349><s%> But he [being] full of compassion יְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> forgave עָוֹן֮ <S%H5771><s%> [their] iniquity וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not יַ֫שְׁחִ֥ית <S%H7843><s%> and destroyed וְ֭הִרְבָּה <S%H7235><s%> [them] not yea many a time לְהָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> away אַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> he his anger וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not יָ֝עִיר <S%H5782><s%> and did not stir up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֲמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2534><s%> all his wrath

וַ֭יִּזְכֹּר <S%H2142><s%> For he remembered כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> that they [were but] flesh הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> a wind ה֝וֹלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> that passeth away וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not יָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> and cometh not again

כַּ֭מָּה <S%H4100><s%> How יַמְר֣וּהוּ <S%H4784><s%> oft did they provoke בַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> him in the wilderness יַ֝עֲצִיב֗וּהוּ <S%H6087><s%> [and] grieve בִּֽישִׁימֽוֹן׃ <S%H3452><s%> him in the desert

וַיָּשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Yea they turned back וַיְנַסּ֣וּ <S%H5254><s%> and tempted אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> God וּקְד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִתְווּ׃ <S%H8428><s%> and limited

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not זָכְר֥וּ <S%H2142><s%> They remembered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> not his hand י֝֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [nor] the day אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> when פָּדָ֥ם <S%H6299><s%> when he delivered מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from צָֽר׃ <S%H6862><s%> them from the enemy

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> When שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> How he had wrought בְּ֭מִצְרַיִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt אֹֽתוֹתָ֑יו <S%H226><s%> his signs וּ֝מוֹפְתָ֗יו <S%H4159><s%> and his wonders בִּשְׂדֵה־ <S%H7704><s%> in the field צֹֽעַן׃ <S%H6814><s%> of Zoan

וַיַּהֲפֹ֣ךְ <S%H2015><s%> And had turned לְ֭דָם <S%H1818><s%> into blood יְאֹרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H2975><s%> their rivers וְ֝נֹזְלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5140><s%> and their floods בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> not יִשְׁתָּיֽוּן׃ <S%H8354><s%> that they could not drink

יְשַׁלַּ֬ח <S%H7971><s%> He sent בָּהֶ֣ם עָ֭רֹב <S%H6157><s%> divers sorts of flies וַיֹּאכְלֵ֑ם <S%H398><s%> among them which devoured וּ֝צְפַרְדֵּ֗עַ <S%H6854><s%> them and frogs וַתַּשְׁחִיתֵֽם׃ <S%H7843><s%> which destroyed

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> He gave לֶחָסִ֣יל <S%H2625><s%> unto the caterpiller יְבוּלָ֑ם <S%H2981><s%> also their increase וִֽ֝יגִיעָ֗ם <S%H3018><s%> and their labour לָאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <S%H697><s%> unto the locust

יַהֲרֹ֣ג <S%H2026><s%> He destroyed בַּבָּרָ֣ד <S%H1259><s%> with hail גַּפְנָ֑ם <S%H1612><s%> their vines וְ֝שִׁקְמוֹתָ֗ם <S%H8256><s%> and their sycomore trees בַּֽחֲנָמַֽל׃ <S%H2602><s%> with frost

וַיַּסְגֵּ֣ר <S%H5462><s%> He gave up לַבָּרָ֣ד <S%H1259><s%> also to the hail בְּעִירָ֑ם <S%H1165><s%> their cattle וּ֝מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H4735><s%> and their flocks לָרְשָׁפִֽים׃ <S%H7565><s%> to hot thunderbolts

יְשַׁלַּח־ <S%H7971><s%> He cast בָּ֨ם ׀ חֲר֬וֹן <S%H2740><s%> upon them the fierceness אַפּ֗וֹ <S%H639><s%> of his anger עֶבְרָ֣ה <S%H5678><s%> wrath וָזַ֣עַם <S%H2195><s%> and indignation וְצָרָ֑ה <S%H6869><s%> and trouble מִ֝שְׁלַ֗חַת <S%H4917><s%> by sending מַלְאֲכֵ֥י <S%H4397><s%> angels רָעִֽים׃ <S%H7451><s%> evil

יְפַלֵּ֥ס <S%H6424><s%> He made נָתִ֗יב <S%H5410><s%> a way לְאַ֫פּ֥וֹ <S%H639><s%> to his anger לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not חָשַׂ֣ךְ <S%H2820><s%> he spared מִמָּ֣וֶת <S%H4194><s%> from death נַפְשָׁ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> not their soul וְ֝חַיָּתָ֗ם <S%H2416><s%> their life לַדֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1698><s%> to the pestilence הִסְגִּֽיר׃ <S%H5462><s%> over

וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> And smote כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> all the firstborn בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt רֵאשִׁ֥ית <S%H7225><s%> the chief א֝וֹנִ֗ים <S%H202><s%> of [their] strength בְּאָהֳלֵי־ <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacles חָֽם׃ <S%H2526><s%> of Ham

וַיַּסַּ֣ע <S%H5265><s%> to go forth כַּצֹּ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> like sheep עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> But made his own people וַֽיְנַהֲגֵ֥ם <S%H5090><s%> and guided כַּ֝עֵ֗דֶר <S%H5739><s%> like a flock בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> them in the wilderness

וַיַּנְחֵ֣ם <S%H5148><s%> And he led לָ֭בֶטַח <S%H983><s%> them on safely וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not פָחָ֑דוּ <S%H6342><s%> so that they feared וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> א֝וֹיְבֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H341><s%> their enemies כִּסָּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> overwhelmed הַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> not but the sea

וַ֭יְבִיאֵם <S%H935><s%> And he brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> them to the border קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> of his sanctuary הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> [even to] this mountain זֶ֝֗ה <S%H2088><s%> to this קָנְתָ֥ה <S%H7069><s%> had purchased יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H3225><s%> [which] his right hand

וַיְגָ֤רֶשׁ <S%H1644><s%> He cast out מִפְּנֵיהֶ֨ם ׀ <S%H6440><s%> also before גּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> the heathen וַֽ֭יַּפִּילֵם <S%H5307><s%> them and divided בְּחֶ֣בֶל <S%H2256><s%> by line נַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> them an inheritance וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> to dwell בְּ֝אָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H168><s%> in their tents שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> and made the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיְנַסּ֣וּ <S%H5254><s%> Yet they tempted וַ֭יַּמְרוּ <S%H4784><s%> and provoked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> God עֶלְי֑וֹן <S%H5945><s%> the most high וְ֝עֵדוֹתָ֗יו <S%H5713><s%> not his testimonies לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and did not שָׁמָֽרוּ׃ <S%H8104><s%> and kept

וַיִּסֹּ֣גוּ <S%H5472><s%> But turned back וַֽ֭יִּבְגְּדוּ <S%H898><s%> and dealt unfaithfully כַּאֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> like their fathers נֶ֝הְפְּכ֗וּ <S%H2015><s%> they were turned aside כְּקֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> bow רְמִיָּֽה׃ <S%H7423><s%> like a deceitful

וַיַּכְעִיס֥וּהוּ <S%H3707><s%> For they provoked him to anger בְּבָמוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1116><s%> with their high places וּ֝בִפְסִילֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6456><s%> with their graven images יַקְנִיאֽוּהוּ׃ <S%H7065><s%> and moved him to jealousy

שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> When God וַֽיִּתְעַבָּ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> [this] he was wroth וַיִּמְאַ֥ס <S%H3988><s%> abhorred מְ֝אֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> and greatly בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַ֭יִּטֹּשׁ <S%H5203><s%> So that he forsook מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle שִׁל֑וֹ <S%H7887><s%> of Shiloh אֹ֝֗הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tent שִׁכֵּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> [which] he placed בָּאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> among men

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> And delivered לַשְּׁבִ֣י <S%H7628><s%> into captivity עֻזּ֑וֹ <S%H5797><s%> his strength וְֽתִפְאַרְתּ֥וֹ <S%H8597><s%> and his glory בְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand צָֽר׃ <S%H6862><s%> into the enemy's
וַיַּסְגֵּ֣ר <S%H5462><s%> over לַחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> also unto the sword עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people וּ֝בְנַחֲלָת֗וֹ <S%H5159><s%> with his inheritance הִתְעַבָּֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> and was wroth

בַּחוּרָ֥יו <S%H970><s%> their young men אָֽכְלָה־ <S%H398><s%> consumed אֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> The fire וּ֝בְתוּלֹתָ֗יו <S%H1330><s%> and their maidens לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> had no הוּלָּֽלוּ׃ <S%H1984><s%> were not given to marriage

כֹּ֭הֲנָיו <S%H3548><s%> Their priests בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword נָפָ֑לוּ <S%H5307><s%> fell וְ֝אַלְמְנֹתָ֗יו <S%H490><s%> and their widows לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִבְכֶּֽינָה׃ <S%H1058><s%> made no lamentation

וַיִּקַ֖ץ <S%H3364><s%> awaked כְּיָשֵׁ֥ן ׀ <S%H3463><s%> as one out of sleep אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> Then the Lord כְּ֝גִבּ֗וֹר <S%H1368><s%> [and] like a mighty man מִתְרוֹנֵ֥ן <S%H7442><s%> that shouteth מִיָּֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> by reason of wine

וַיַּךְ־ <S%H5221><s%> And he smote צָרָ֥יו <S%H6862><s%> his enemies אָח֑וֹר <S%H268><s%> in the hinder parts חֶרְפַּ֥ת <S%H2781><s%> reproach ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> them to a perpetual נָ֣תַן <S%H5414><s%> he put לָֽמוֹ׃

וַ֭יִּמְאַס <S%H3988><s%> Moreover he refused בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph וּֽבְשֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> not the tribe אֶ֝פְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and did not בָחָֽר׃ <S%H977><s%> and chose

וַ֭יִּבְחַר <S%H977><s%> But chose אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the tribe יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> the mount צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אָהֵֽב׃ <S%H157><s%> which he loved

וַיִּ֣בֶן <S%H1129><s%> And he built כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like רָ֭מִים <S%H7311><s%> like high מִקְדָּשׁ֑וֹ <S%H4720><s%> his sanctuary כְּ֝אֶ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [palaces] like the earth יְסָדָ֥הּ <S%H3245><s%> which he hath established לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

וַ֭יִּבְחַר <S%H977><s%> He chose בְּדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> David עַבְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5650><s%> also his servant וַ֝יִּקָּחֵ֗הוּ <S%H3947><s%> and took מִֽמִּכְלְאֹ֥ת <S%H4356><s%> fold צֹֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> cattle

מֵאַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> From following עָל֗וֹת <S%H5763><s%> the ewes great with young הֱ֫בִיא֥וֹ <S%H935><s%> he brought לִ֭רְעוֹת <S%H7462><s%> him to feed בְּיַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people וּ֝בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5159><s%> his inheritance

וַ֭יִּרְעֵם <S%H7462><s%> So he fed כְּתֹ֣ם <S%H8537><s%> them according to the integrity לְבָב֑וֹ <S%H3824><s%> of his heart וּבִתְבוּנ֖וֹת <S%H8394><s%> them by the skilfulness כַּפָּ֣יו <S%H3709><s%> of his hands יַנְחֵֽם׃ <S%H5148><s%> and guided
